feed.title: 云游小强
feed.subtitle: 学习使用代码管理公有云和私有云

entry.title: 将域名从namesilo转移到cloudflare
entry.content:
1. Login namsilo
2. Unlock domain
3. Update dns to 
jason.ns.cloudflare.com
tricia.ns.cloudflare.com
4. Get Authorization code
5. Add payment info if not in cloudflare
6. Add site to cloudflare
7. Waiting domain available under transfer domains
8. Select domain to tranfer and finish payment
9. Approve transfer in namesilo   10. Waiting transfer finish.
entry.summary: 1. Login namsilo 2. Unlock domain 3. Update dns to jason.ns.cloudflare.com tricia.ns.cloudflare.com 4. Get Authorization code 5. Add payment info if not in cloudflare 6. Add site to cloudflare 7. Waiting domain available under transfer domains 8. Select domain to tranfer and finish payment 9. Approve transfer in namesilo 10. Waiting transfer finish.

entry.title: 使用Github Pages托管静态网站

link.title: 使用Github Pages托管静态网站

entry.content: 使用Jekyll GitHub VSCode组合生成静态网站存储在Github Pages上。
entry.summary: 使用Jekyll GitHub VSCode组合生成静态网站存储在Github Pages上。
